instructions.afterLoading: After loading the subtitles and media file:
instructions.editText: Click the subtitle text or timestamps to edit your captions.
instructions.icons: Click the icons to add, merge or delete subtitles.
instructions.dragBorders: Drag the dashed borders on the waveform to change the subtitles' time stamps.
instructions.rememberSave: Remember to click "Save SRT" to save the subtitles when you finish editing!

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts:
shortcuts.tab: to edit the current subtitle text.
shortcuts.arrowsAction: to jump to the previous/next subtitle.
shortcuts.splitSubtitle: to split the subtitle text at the cursor position when editing it.
shortcuts.mergeSubtitle: to merge the current subtitle with the previous one.

dialog.discardDescription: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them by loading a new SRT file?
dialog.switchDescription: Changing the language will discard the current subtitles. Make sure you have downloaded the current SRT first.
dialog.srtDescription: You can add 4 tracks at most. You can load a .srt file or create a new track from scratch.
dialog.deleteTrackDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the track and all its subtitles.

metadata.title: Subtitle Editor - Permanently Free, Open-source, Fully Web-based SRT Editing Tool
metadata.description: Edit, create, and align SRT subtitle and captions files easily with this free, open-source, web-based editor. Features video preview and waveform visualization. No signup required.
